title: Question about self-mistery gifting?
body:
Hello there, can someone help me or explain how this self-mistery gifting works? 
I dont get it at all, will be aprecciated...

Thanks and GG

replies.body: Hey there, our [mystery gifting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752934-Mystery-Gifting-FAQ) should help clear things up but it will unlock a random skin for a champion that you own worth at least 520 RP.  Normally this is open to only gifting others, but currently available to unlock for yourself!
but how are you supposed to gift yourself? you can't choose your name
This one isn't through the gifting center.  You'll find it in the store section under Skins.

So i need to spent 520 RP on 1 mistery gift, send it to one of my friends and i get a mistery gift  by doing that? or how can i unlock it??

Sorry for the inconvenience
Nope!  It is available in the store under Skins.  There will be an option for Mystery Gift and Chest, a chest giving you higher quality skins for a bit more RP.
